title: Fontanini Matthew Figurine
description: Fontanini Nativity - The fourth generation of the Fontanini family brings the time honored Italian Fontanini Nativity tradition into homes all over the world... including yours. These marvelous Fontanini figures are still crafted in Bagni di Lucca, a charming Italian village nestled in the hills of Tuscany. This region is home to the Fontaninis, who continue to carry on the artistic legacy of their great-grandfather and founder of the company, Emanuele Fontanini.
